word.description: {雞蛋} is *chicken egg* ({雞} is *chicken* and {蛋} is *egg*), and {仔} is *child* or *little*, so {雞蛋仔} is *little chicken eggs*.

images.place: Meet Fresh, South Salt Lake, Utah

description: Egg waffles, so named because the instead of indentations they feature egg-shaped bubbles, are a Hong Kong street food snack dating back to the 1950s.

word.Yale: jyū gū līk gāi dáan jái
word.Pinyin: qiǎo kè lì jī dàn zǐ
